name: Yves Padrines
description: Yves Padrines has been CEO of the Nemetschek Group since March 2022. He brings extensive experience in software and technology leadership from his time at Cisco and other technology companies.
vision: To lead the digital transformation of the AEC/O industry through innovative software solutions and drive sustainable building practices.
recentDevelopments: Expanding BIM and digital twin capabilities
Driving AI integration in design software
